name: VNHumanHandPoseObservation
desc: An observation that provides the hand points the analysis recognized.

items.name: var availableJointNames: [VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName]
items.desc: The names of the available joints in the observation.

items.name: struct VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The supported joint names for the hand pose.

items.name: var availableJointsGroupNames: [VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointsGroupName]
items.desc: The joint group names available in the observation.

items.name: struct VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointsGroupName
items.desc: The supported joint group names for the hand pose.

items.name: func recognizedPoint(VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName) -> VNRecognizedPoint
items.desc: Retrieves the recognized point for a joint name.

items.name: func recognizedPoints(VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointsGroupName) -> [VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName : VNRecognizedPoint]
items.desc: Retrieves the recognized points associated with the joint group name.

items.name: var chirality: VNChirality
items.desc: The chirality, or handedness, of a pose.

items.name: enum VNChirality
items.desc: Constants that the define the chirality, or handedness, of a pose.
